name: C. Game of Mathletes
input: InputThe first line contains an integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \leq t \leq 10^4$$$) — the number of test cases. The first line of each test case contains two integers $$$n$$$ and $$$k$$$ ($$$2 \leq n \leq 2\cdot 10^5, 1 \leq k \leq 2\cdot n$$$, $$$n$$$ is even).The second line of each test case contains $$$n$$$ integers $$$x_1,x_2,\ldots,x_n$$$ ($$$1 \leq x_i \leq n$$$) — the integers on the blackboard.It is guaranteed that the sum of $$$n$$$ over all test cases does not exceed $$$2\cdot 10^5$$$.
output: OutputFor each test case, output the score if both players play optimally.
